p.text: All objects in Algorithm 2 were treated Name . On this property can be uniquely specify object , you want to use.

p.textAll: The name can be absolutely any , the main thing that you would It was clear that the object is hidden behind this name.

remarks.text: several objects may actually be same name , but it should be different number . In this case, the objects are combined into a very useful structure, which is called array .
